kubejs.ponder.advanced_large_steam_boile: The only difference is the addition of one layer and the controller being moved up a block up a block
kubejs.ponder.blood_generator.text_1: Hatches can replace any of the Steel Machine Casings in the structure
kubejs.ponder.blood_generator.text_2: The completed structure. Remember to use the wrench preview when building it!
kubejs.ponder.boss_crusher.text_1: Hatches can only go on the top or bottom
kubejs.ponder.cinderhearth.text_2: Alternate blocks can be used for the structure. Feel free to mix and match
kubejs.ponder.coke_oven.text_1: Fluid Input, Fluid Output, Item Input, and Item Output hatches can be placed in any configuration on the top and bottom layers
kubejs.ponder.coke_oven.text_2: Note that the center is hollow
kubejs.ponder.coke_oven.text_3: Do not fill in the middle block
kubejs.ponder.core_mining_drill.text_1: The center 2x2 is made of quarry tubes
kubejs.ponder.core_mining_drill.text_2: Hatches can only be placed on the edge of the first layer on the top
kubejs.ponder.distillation_tower.text_1: Energy Input Hatches can only go on the bottom layer
kubejs.ponder.distillation_tower.text_2: Center block is Stainless Steel Pipe Machine Casing
kubejs.ponder.distillation_tower.text_3: The output fluid is determined by the layer. In REI the first output fluid corresponds to the first layer, and so on.
kubejs.ponder.distillation_tower.text_4: This is the minimum size Distillation Tower. You can increase size by adding more layers and updating the value in the controller. If you have a two high controller, and three outputs, the last two outpus will be voided
kubejs.ponder.distillation_tower.text_5: At 10 blocks tall, this is the maximum size Distillation Tower, offering up to nine different fluid outputs
kubejs.ponder.electric_blast_furnace.tex: Hatches can go on the top or bottom rows
Kanthal Coils will upgrade the maximum EU that can be used in the Electric Blast Furnace
kubejs.ponder.electric_quarry.text_1: The Chain goes in the center of the multiblock
kubejs.ponder.electric_quarry.text_2: The only differences between the Steam counterpart is needing an Energy Input Hatch
kubejs.ponder.enchanter.text_1: The Liquid Crystal in the pools can be flowing. It does not have to be all source blocks
kubejs.ponder.enchanter.text_3: Alternate blocks can be used for the structure. Feel free to mix and match
kubejs.ponder.fusion_reactor.text_1: The internals of the rings are made of Fusion Chamber blocks
kubejs.ponder.fusion_reactor.text_2: Hatches can only go on the center block on each side of the ring
kubejs.ponder.fusion_shrine.text_2: Note the slabs surrounding the base of the shrine itself
kubejs.ponder.fusion_shrine.text_3: Alternate blocks can be used for the structure. Feel free to mix and match
kubejs.ponder.greenhouse.text_1: The center block is a dirt block. This will go directly under the logs
kubejs.ponder.greenhouse.text_2: Hatches can only replace the Steel Machine Casings on the first layer
kubejs.ponder.greenhouse.text_3: The logs must be oak for the multiblock. They do not determine which recipe can be run in the multiblock.
kubejs.ponder.heat_exchanger.text_1: Input Hatches go on the right side (always from your perspective
kubejs.ponder.heat_exchanger.text_2: Output Hatches go on the left side (always from your perspective)
kubejs.ponder.heat_exchanger.text_3: Energy Input always goes along the center line
kubejs.ponder.heat_exchanger.text_4: Input Hatch still on the right side (from your perspective)
kubejs.ponder.heat_exchanger.text_5: Output Hatch still on the left side (from your perspective)
kubejs.ponder.high_pressure_advanced_lar: The High Pressure Advanced Large Steam Boiler
The Hatches must go on the base plate
The center blocks are Stainless Steel Pipe Machine Casing
kubejs.ponder.high_pressure_large_steam_: The High Pressure Large Steam Boiler
The Hatches must go on the base plate
The center blocks are Stainless Steel PIpe Machine Casing
kubejs.ponder.implosion_compressor.text_: Hatches can only go on the bottom layer
kubejs.ponder.large_chemical_reactor.tex: The center is a PTFE Machine Pipe Casing
kubejs.ponder.large_diesel_generator.tex: Fluid Input Hatches go on the sides
The Energy Output Hatch goes in the center back block
kubejs.ponder.large_steam_boiler.text_1: Bottom layer is made of Heatproof Machine Casings and hatches
kubejs.ponder.large_steam_boiler.text_2: The center blocks are Bronze Pipe Machine Casings
kubejs.ponder.large_steam_macerator.head: The Large Steam Macerator
kubejs.ponder.large_steam_macerator.text: The center is made of Bronze Machine Pipe Casings
kubejs.ponder.large_steam_turbine.text_1: The Fluid Input Hatch must go in the front of the multiblock
kubejs.ponder.large_steam_turbine.text_2: The Energy Output Hatch goes in the back middle block
kubejs.ponder.large_tank.text_1: The fluid pipes connect directly to the controller block
kubejs.ponder.large_tank.text_2: This is the minimum size tank. You can adjust the size of the tank in the controller
kubejs.ponder.large_tank.text_3: This is the maximum size Large Tank. It can store almost 22,000 buckets of fluid.
kubejs.ponder.mega_smelter.text_2: The Input/Output Hatches can replace any of the Heatproof Machine Casings
kubejs.ponder.mob_crusher.text_1: The center of this multiblock is hollow
kubejs.ponder.nuclear_reactor.text_1: The internals of the multiblock are Nuclear Alloy Pipe Machine Casings
kubejs.ponder.nuclear_reactor.text_2: Nuclear Fluid and Item Hatches go on the top layer of the multiblock
kubejs.ponder.nuclear_reactor.text_3: The size of the reactor can be changed in the controller. Use your MI wrench to help build it.
kubejs.ponder.oil_drilling_rig.text_1: This makes up the base of the Drilling Rig
kubejs.ponder.oil_drilling_rig.text_2: Hatches can only go on the same level as the controller
kubejs.ponder.pedestal_tier1.text_1: The center block below the pedestal can be hollow
kubejs.ponder.pedestal_tier1.text_2: The corner pillars are one block above the base plate
kubejs.ponder.pedestal_tier1.text_3: Alternate blocks can be useds for the structure. Feel free to mix and match
kubejs.ponder.pedestal_tier2.text_1: The center block below the pedestal can be hollow
kubejs.ponder.pedestal_tier2.text_3: Alternate blocks can be used for the structure. Feel free to mix and match
kubejs.ponder.plasma_turbine.text_1: Fluid Input Hatches can only go on the front
kubejs.ponder.plasma_turbine.text_2: The Energy Output Hatch goes in the back middle block
kubejs.ponder.pressurizer.text_1: Only the Fluid Output Hatch and Energy Input Hatch are allowed on the bottom layer
kubejs.ponder.pressurizer.text_2: Only the Fluid Input Hatch is allowed on the top layer
kubejs.ponder.pyrolyse_oven.text_1: The controller is in the middle.
kubejs.ponder.pyrolyse_oven.text_2: The center Cupronickel Coil part is hollow
kubejs.ponder.pyrolyse_oven.text_3: The Input/Output Hatches can replace any of the Heatproof Machine Casings
kubejs.ponder.singularity_forge.text_1: Hatches can only go on the same layer as the controller
kubejs.ponder.singularity_forge.text_2: Youe going to want to use the wrench preview for this one...
kubejs.ponder.space_probe_launcher.text_: The center is Machine Pipe Casings
The controller goes in the middle
Hatches only go on the edges
kubejs.ponder.spirit_instiller.text_2: Alternate blocks can be used for the structure. Feel free to mix and match
kubejs.ponder.steam_blast_furnace.text_1: Fluid Input, Item Input, and Item Output Hatches can be placed in any configuration on the top and bottom layers
kubejs.ponder.steam_blast_furnace.text_2: Note that the center is hollow
kubejs.ponder.steam_quarry.text_1: The Chain goes in the center of the multiblock
